snippet: Notre Dame, fresh off its A.C.C. announcement, travels to Michigan State on Saturday, a matchup that intrigues the letter men.
abstract: Notre Dame, fresh off its A.C.C. announcement, travels to Michigan State on Saturday, a matchup that intrigues the letter men.

byline.original: By PAUL MYERBERG and ROBERT WEINTRAUB

headline.main: College Football Lettermen Stay On the News
